buttons.message_template: Open askIT Remote Support on your desktop (the robot icon), then enter this 6-digit PIN: {pin}. If you are prompted for an update, press OK and then restart the application.

buttons.message: Press OK to the next two prompts on your screen so I can control your computer.
Thank you for contacting askIT, we are sending you this message to let you know we have received your ticket and are working on a solution.
Thank you for contacting askIT. We've received your ticket and routed it to the right group.
Your account has been unlocked, you may now try signing in again. If you need to reset your password please go to https://aka.ms/sspr
Your SAP account password has been reset, you may now try signing in again with your new password: today365 -- It will make you set a new password upon signing in.
